title: Celebrating a Year of Commitment to CNCF Flux: Sustainability, Innovation, and Growth
author: Francesco Beltramini
description: ControlPlane stepped in to support CNCF Flux when funding ran dry, ensuring its maintainers could continue development.
cntitle: 庆祝 CNCF Flux 一周年：可持续性、创新和增长
cndescription: ControlPlane 在 CNCF Flux 资金耗尽时介入提供支持，确保其维护者能够继续开发。
